attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: most young girls and boys read magazines. They see celebrities everywhere and think that it is possible to look like them. This then makes them want to diet. There are children as young as 10 years old, maybe younger, starving themselves because they want to be like their famous role models who dont look like that anyway. This must be stopped

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
